name: tm22
effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
